Which of the following is the primary reason for using exploring data by joining and combining in marketing analytics?
A) To store data in different tables or sources
B) To perform comprehensive analysis of customer behavior
C) To identify the characteristics of the data being analyzed
D) To choose the method for joining and combining data

Explain how a common identifier or key can be used to join and combine datasets in marketing analytics. Provide an example of a common identifier that can be used to merge two datasets in the context of customer behavior analysis.
